author: Jesse R. Raines
description: This Negroni-inspired cocktail will please mezcal loving bartenders and hardened drinkers (we also loved it) but may challenge other drinkers.
name: Meh-Groni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
